location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 92 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that a packet from Colonel John Macdonald, which had been taken from Bassidore [Bāsa’īdū] to Muscat by HC Cruizer Elphinstonehad been lost on a Batils (boat) near Cape Ras All had [Ra’s al Ḩadd] en route to Bombay.
